confirmDiscardChanges_one: Are you sure you want to discard your 1 selected change? Discarded changes cannot be recovered.
confirmDiscardChanges_other: Are you sure you want to discard your {count} selected changes? Discarded changes cannot be recovered.
discardTooltip_one:
Discard the selected uncommitted changed file, even if untracked.

Note: Changes to this file will be irreversably lost.
discardTooltip_other:
Discard {count} selected uncommitted changes, including untracked files.

Note: Changes will be irreversably lost.
